Posted By: Misunderestimated (Brian H.)
T202 "Easy for Larry" - "Laughing" Larry Doyle and  (the ill-fated) Fred Merkle.  
T202 "Just Before the Battle" - Fred Snodgrass (also ill-fated) and John "Red" Murray.

$225 each or both for $430 (postage/delivery confirmation and insurance included) Paypal accepted without any additional charges.

The rule is whomever(or it is "whoever"?) emails me first at 
bhodes@rcn.com 
accepting these terms has priority -- not the first one to first post here or the first one to email me asking for more scans or something.
